Texts.Chs: 给你，船长。这个防护罩运行的很好！
Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain. This shield is starting to come together quite well!

Texts.Chs: 防护罩发生器仍然处于原始状态，但是所有的连接都被烧坏了，而且没有电源供给防护罩。^green;找来^orange;8部分天人科技^green;和^orange;16块天人金属^reset;，之后我应该能为发生器做一个功能外壳。
Texts.Eng: The shield generator is still in pristine condition, but all of the connections were fried, and there's no power source for the shield. ^green;Find me ^orange;8 pieces of Centensian Tech^green; and ^orange;16 pieces of Centensian Metal^reset;, and I should be able to build a functional casing for the generator.
